appName: Card Color VR: Match3 Time Attack

descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

displayName: Card Color VR: Match3 Time Attack
display_name: Card Color VR: Match3 Time Attack
display_long_description:
Card Color VR is a focused VR match-3 color puzzle played on a grid of numbered cards. Tap cards to change their color and create clears. When 3 or more cards of the same color connect, they match and disappear, earning you points and opening space for faster chains.

You have 10 levels and each level is a race against time—clear efficiently, plan ahead, and finish before the timer runs out.

How to play

Tap a card to change its color

Connect 3+ of the same color (side-by-side)

Matches clear instantly and you gain points

Beat the timer to complete the level

Highlights

10 levels with escalating challenge

Time-attack gameplay: speed + strategy

Satisfying clears and chain reactions

Comfortable VR interaction, easy to understand
